instruction

Class InstructionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • instruction.InstructionController

  • public class InstructionController
extends java.lang.Object
    A developer-friendly wrapper of an instruction. Allows generation of the next instruction state, provides access to the instruction instance, gets the status of the current instruction, and can define a "reversed" state to allow for reverse input images.

    Author:
    heshamsalman
